patthana15.68:1.1_0: Niyataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Aniyataṁ
patthana15.68:1.1_1: kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.68:2.1_0: Niyataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.68:2.1_1: Aniyataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.68:2.1_2: Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve. (Abyākatamūle dve paccayavasena.)
